Classes

class  CPTimeFormatter
 A number formatter that converts time intervals to dates. Useful for formatting labels on an axis. If you choose the numerical scale of the plot space to be in seconds, axis labels can be directly generated by setting a CPTimeFormatter as the tickLabelFormatter. More...
